data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: You cannot view them as if you are unable to scroll down
data.expected_result: You should be able to view the option to grant temporary membership and the "Create Link" button, previously possible on 4.0.2 (401)
data.short_description: Unable to view entire settings menu for invitations in landscape mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that you can generate invite links for - Tap on "Create Instant Invite" - Click the gear icon right next to the invite code - Switch to landscape mode and notice how the option to grant temporary membership and the "Create Link" button cannot be viewed as if you are unable to scroll down.
